verses.verse: And Ach'av <WH256> told <WH5046> <WH8686> Jezebel <WH348> all that Eliyahyahu <WH452> had done <WH6213> <WH8804>, and withal how he had slain <WH2026> <WH8804> all the prophets <WH5030> with the sword <WH2719>.

Then Jezebel <WH348> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> a messenger <WH4397> unto Eliyahyahu <WH452>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, So let the 'elohim <WH430> do <WH6213> <WH8799> to me, and more <WH3254> <WH8686> also, if I make <WH7760> <WH8799> not thy life <WH5315> as the life <WH5315> of one <WH259> of them by to morrow <WH4279> about this time <WH6256>.

And when he saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that, he arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> for his life <WH5315>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> to Be'er-Sheva <WH884>, which belongeth to Y'hudah <WH3063>, and left <WH3240> <WH8686> his servant <WH5288> there.

But he himself went <WH1980> <WH8804> a day's <WH3117> journey <WH1870> into the wilderness <WH4057>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> and sat down <WH3427> <WH8799> under a <WH259> juniper tree <WH7574>: and he requested <WH7592> <WH8799> for himself <WH5315> that he might die <WH4191> <WH8800>; and said <WH559> <WH8799>, It is enough <WH7227>; now, O YY <WH3068>, take away <WH3947> <WH8798> my life <WH5315>; for I am not better <WH2896> than my fathers <WH1>.

And as he lay <WH7901> <WH8799> and slept <WH3462> <WH8799> under a <WH259> juniper tree <WH7574>, behold, then an angel <WH4397> touched <WH5060> <WH8802> him, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Arise <WH6965> <WH8798> and eat <WH398> <WH8798>.

And he looked <WH5027> <WH8686>, and, behold, there was a cake <WH5692> baken on the coals <WH7529>, and a cruse <WH6835> of water <WH4325> at his head <WH4763>. And he did eat <WH398> <WH8799> and drink <WH8354> <WH8799>, and laid him down <WH7901> <WH8799> again <WH7725> <WH8799>.

And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> came again <WH7725> <WH8799> the second time <WH8145>, and touched <WH5060> <WH8799> him, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Arise <WH6965> <WH8798> and eat <WH398> <WH8798>; because the journey <WH1870> is too great <WH7227> for thee.

And he arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and did eat <WH398> <WH8799> and drink <WH8354> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> in the strength <WH3581> of that meat <WH396> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915> unto Horev <WH2722> the mount <WH2022> of 'Elohim <WH430>.

And he came <WH935> <WH8799> thither unto a cave <WH4631>, and lodged <WH3885> <WH8799> there; and, behold, the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came to him, and he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, What doest thou here, Eliyahyahu <WH452> ?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I have been very <WH7065> <WH8763> jealous <WH7065> <WH8765> for the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> TZva'ot <WH6635>: for the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> have forsaken <WH5800> <WH8804> thy covenant <WH1285>, thrown down <WH2040> <WH8804> thine altars <WH4196>, and slain <WH2026> <WH8804> thy prophets <WH5030> with the sword <WH2719>; and I, even I only, am left <WH3498> <WH8735>; and they seek <WH1245> <WH8762> my life <WH5315>, to take it away <WH3947> <WH8800>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Go forth <WH3318> <WH8798>, and stand <WH5975> <WH8804> upon the mount <WH2022> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>. And, behold, the YY <WH3068> passed by <WH5674> <WH8802>, and a great <WH1419> and strong <WH2389> wind <WH7307> rent <WH6561> <WH8764> the mountains <WH2022>, and brake in pieces <WH7665> <WH8764> the rocks <WH5553> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>; but the YY <WH3068> was not in the wind <WH7307>: and after <WH310> the wind <WH7307> an earthquake <WH7494>; but the YY <WH3068> was not in the earthquake <WH7494>:
And after <WH310> the earthquake <WH7494> a fire <WH784>; but the YY <WH3068> was not in the fire <WH784>: and after <WH310> the fire <WH784> a still <WH1827> small <WH1851> voice <WH6963>.

And it was so, when Eliyahyahu <WH452> heard <WH8085> <WH8800> it, that he wrapped <WH3874> <WH8686> his face <WH6440> in his mantle <WH155>, and went out <WH3318> <WH8799>, and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> in the entering in <WH6607> of the cave <WH4631>. And, behold, there came a voice <WH6963> unto him, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, What doest thou here, Eliyahyahu <WH452> ?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I have been very <WH7065> <WH8763> jealous <WH7065> <WH8765> for the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> TZva'ot <WH6635>: because the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> have forsaken <WH5800> <WH8804> thy covenant <WH1285>, thrown down <WH2040> <WH8804> thine altars <WH4196>, and slain <WH2026> <WH8804> thy prophets <WH5030> with the sword <WH2719>; and I, even I only, am left <WH3498> <WH8735>; and they seek <WH1245> <WH8762> my life <WH5315>, to take it away <WH3947> <WH8800>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Go <WH3212> <WH8798>, return <WH7725> <WH8798> on thy way <WH1870> to the wilderness <WH4057> of Damascus <WH1834>: and when thou comest <WH935> <WH8804>, anoint <WH4886> <WH8804> Hazael <WH2371> to be king <WH4428> over Syria <WH758>:

And Yehu <WH3058> the son <WH1121> of Nimshi <WH5250> shalt thou anoint <WH4886> <WH8799> to be king <WH4428> over Yisra'EL <WH3478>: and Elisha <WH477> the son <WH1121> of Shaphat <WH8202> of Hevelmeholah <WH65> shalt thou anoint <WH4886> <WH8799> to be prophet <WH5030> in thy room.

And it shall come to pass, that him that escapeth <WH4422> <WH8737> the sword <WH2719> of Hazael <WH2371> shall Yehu <WH3058> slay <WH4191> <WH8686>: and him that escapeth <WH4422> <WH8737> from the sword <WH2719> of Yehu <WH3058> shall Elisha <WH477> slay <WH4191> <WH8686>.

Yet I have left <WH7604> <WH8689> me seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>, all the knees <WH1290> which have not bowed <WH3766> <WH8804> unto Baal <WH1168>, and every mouth <WH6310> which hath not kissed <WH5401> <WH8804> him.

So he departed <WH3212> <WH8799> thence, and found <WH4672> <WH8799> Elisha <WH477> the son <WH1121> of Shaphat <WH8202>, who was plowing <WH2790> <WH8802> with twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> yoke <WH6776> of oxen before <WH6440> him, and he with the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240>: and Eliyahyahu <WH452> passed <WH5674> <WH8799> by him, and cast <WH7993> <WH8686> his mantle <WH155> upon him.

And he left <WH5800> <WH8799> the oxen <WH1241>, and ran <WH7323> <WH8799> after <WH310> Eliyahyahu <WH452>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let me, I pray thee, kiss <WH5401> <WH8799> my father <WH1> and my mother <WH517>, and then I will follow <WH3212> <WH8799> <WH310> thee. And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Go back <WH3212> <WH8798> again <WH7725> <WH8798>: for what have I done <WH6213> <WH8804> to thee?

And he returned back <WH7725> <WH8799> from him <WH310>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> a yoke <WH6776> of oxen <WH1241>, and slew <WH2076> <WH8799> them, and boiled <WH1310> <WH8765> their flesh <WH1320> with the instruments <WH3627> of the oxen <WH1241>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971>, and they did eat <WH398> <WH8799>. Then he arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> after <WH310> Eliyahyahu <WH452>, and ministered <WH8334> <WH8762> unto him.
